name: Exlabs
description:
Exlabs is a specialist consultancy firm helping organisations embrace the Cloud Native culture enabling them to evolve and innovate faster. 
We've started our journey in 2011 supporting technological startups accelerate the validation of product assumptions and build software applications that actually build business. Throughout the years we’ve learned that lack of DevOps automation becomes a massive drain of resources which could otherwise be focusing on user-centric approach to software design and creation of competitive advantage.
On the outset, we're specialists in build and modernisation of frontend applications for web and mobile. We help companies achieve business goals my marrying highly interactive interfaces with the performance required for scale.
Deliver to market faster with Angular and React experts and a predictable production process.
Our expertise includes:
Enterprise web development
Serverless applications
Front-end modernisation
Single Page Applications
Code & architecture audit
